bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of long 癃 , protuberance-illness, and lin 淋 , dripping. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry mu xiang 木香：膀胱氣不化則癃淋 , “Failure of the urinary bladder qi to transform results in protuberance-illness and dripping ”. The main feature of “protuberance-illness” is xia jiao qi bi 下焦氣閉 , a blockage of the qi of the lower burner; the main features of “dripping” are distinguished as re lin 熱淋 , heat dripping; qi lin 氣淋 , qi dripping; xu lin 虛淋 , depletion dripping; gao lin 膏淋 , pasty dripping; and sha shi lin 沙石淋 , sand and stone dripping.
